about_the_game:
Get ready for a unique blend of versus fighting and Shmups genres in our explosive new game, Shoot-Fighters! Battle it out with up to 4 players in intense 2.5D interactive arenas, where the real test is surviving the barrage of bullets flying at you from all sides.



Choose one of 12 champions, each with their own distinct combat strategies, and take on artificial intelligence in story mode. But the real fun is in 1-on-1 and 2-on-2 modes, where your reactivity, composure, and ability to read your opponent are key to victory.



Experience fully interactive themed arenas with destructible walls and objects that add a new dimension of strategy to your battles. With realistic physics and gravity, you can use the arena to your advantage by taking cover or using objects to assist in combat. Each player can combine 3 weapons and 3 defense systems, including super attacks and transforming into a giant boss!

KEY FEATURES

Cooperative and Competitive Gameplay
Join forces with your friends to play fun mini-games and hone your skills. Then, take your talents online and compete against the best!


Become the Boss
Don't settle for just being fast and powerful. Transform into a mighty giant boss and crush your opponents!



Never-Before-Seen Gameplay
Prepare to experience a unique blend of versus fighting and ship gameplay that will leave you in awe. Get ready to discover a new way to play and feel!



Rollback Netcode
With cutting-edge technology, you can play online at lightning speed and enjoy seamless gameplay.

Never Boring
Every game is a new adventure thanks to endless mechanic combinations and interactive arenas. Mix and match various game modes with constantly growing content, and you'll always have something new to explore!



Accessible to All
Shoot-Fighters' kid-friendly visuals and intuitive gameplay make it a game that's perfect for everyone. It's the ultimate game for family fun and carefree parties!

Easy to Learn, Hard to Master
Don't be fooled by its simplicity. Shoot-Fighters is filled with hidden secrets and mechanics that you'll discover as you fight your way to becoming the best fighter in the world!



A Warm and Friendly Community
Join our growing community of fighters and get ready to receive and give feedback. Frequent updates and patches ensure that Shoot Fighters is balanced and always evolving for the best gameplay possible!

THE PILOTS

ALYA
Check out Alya, the hottest ace pilot of the Human Solar Union! She's the defender of humanity and a key player in the epic conflict unfolding throughout Galactea. With her nimble spacecraft, she wields a powerful railgun and a rotary plasma cannon to take down any foes in her path. And if things get really hairy, she can unleash a devastating energy beam that'll end the battle in a flash. Alya is the ultimate badass, keeping humanity on top in a galaxy full of challenges!



NAVI
Meet Navi, the most skilled pilot of the Lamentiriels and arguably the greatest champion in the galaxy! Navi honed her natural talents from a young age, developing incredible reflexes and unparalleled combat instincts. With her spacecraft equipped with the most advanced technologies in the universe and accompanied by the top experts in every discipline, Navi embodies an ideal and serves as an inspiration to her people. But now, she faces her biggest challenge yet...



Here is a sneak peek at some of the upcoming pilots set to join the game!

THE SHIPS

ALYA
Alya's flagship is the pinnacle of the Human Solar Union fleet technology. Designed for dueling, it boasts two photon cells for two hours of uninterrupted combat. With no wheels to reduce weight, it only lands on zero-gravity pods. It operates at 100% capacity in any environment, gravity or not. A short-range teleportation system under the cockpit seat can extract the pilot in case of an explosion, the most widespread safety system in the galaxy. The ship is piloted by a combination of manual and virtual controls, with 12 discreet connectors in the suit for unparalleled responsiveness and comfort. The seat is molded to the pilot's measurements for stability and G-resistance. This costly ship is exclusively assembled in a secret factory devoted to dueling.



NAVY
Lamentiriel fighters are sleek, automated and powerful, powered by a mysterious almost inexhaustible energy source. Navi's ship has no canopy, its smooth hull covered in hundreds of sensors that give Navi a full view of the battlefield. The ship's graceful design and finish reflect Lamentiriel's mastery of technology. Navi's discreet weapons are tailored to their combat style and with Gem energy powering them, their attacks are unstoppable. The ship's unique technology allows for zero-gravity flight, while magnetism maintains specific elements in place around the ship.



Here is a sneak peek at some of the upcoming ships set to join the game!

short_description: Step into the future where the universe's fate hangs on judicial duels fought by elite pilots in unique spaceships. Represent your galaxy and defend your values in unpredictable judicial duels. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping ride into the future!
